Screenshot-from-2020-03-25-20-35-39.png

Does this Create Organisation btn need to be that big?
I mean only Create can do the job done
Also, the err message is poping outside the container

Screenshot-from-2020-03-25-20-39-01.png
I am not much sure about changing Create Organisation to Create. I don't think it will make any significant impact. BTW the error messages issue is addressed in #14027
I think a big button here is an important call to action, and if we said "Create" it would seem like you're trying to create an email.

Steve Howell said:

I think a big button here is an important call to action, and if we said "Create" it would seem like you're trying to create an email.

but that can be cleared by the header Create a new Zulip organisation
Fair enough, I still prefer the big button here, but we'll see what others think.
I agree with @Steve Howell . IMO Create a new Zulip organisation heading will have less impact on the user as compared to the button for this action.

Most people only view this button once or twice ever, so being descriptive here is probably more important than being concise. (as opposed to say, the "Send" button in our app, which would be obnoxious if it were "Send message to recipient")

Yeah, I agree, the confirmation that you're doing what you think you are with the button text feels appropriate for a rarely-used page like this (A lot more people sign up for normal accounts than try to create organizations).
